Name: Average time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Manuscript Export Succeeded in the post-acceptance phase
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch across all variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total resolution time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured as the duration until Awaiting Assignment to Batch in accepted manuscript pathways
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time from SW-EIC Accept to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared with the average time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and First Look-Your updates are overdue in variants where update reminders occur
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Total time from First Look-Please submit updates to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation versus total time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average waiting time to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation after First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Elapsed time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and the subsequent Manuscript Export Succeeded in final production steps
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
